p: The essential oil of garlic is a source of organosulfur compounds and allicin is a reactive sulfur species found in it. The organosulfur in the essential garlic oil inhibit the ACE2 (host‐receptor site of the virus) and main protease of the virus as well as to treat the infection due to SARS‐CoV‐2. Docking simulation and synergistic interactions show that the essential garlic oil has the ability to inhibit ACE2 and resist CoV‐19. 96 This oil is also beneficial in treatment of antithrombotic, hypoglycemia, hypotension, and immunomodulation.
